column6: Fortnite introduces a new Limited Time Mode call "Solo Showdown".  It looks like they may add ranking in the future based on the popularity of this mode.  Ranked matches would be a great way for new players to play against players of similar skillset
Is anyone going to check out the upcoming public beta test for Death Garden.  It's an asymmetrical horror game with shooter elements.  I think it looks really fun!

column5: Testing a new Topic on the School Site!
